content: These recommendations are really helpful! I've heard of some of these authors but haven't had a chance to read them yet. I'm especially interested in Paulette Jiles and Martha Hall Kelly. I think I'll check out their books next. By the way, I recently participated in an online book club discussion on Facebook Live, where we discussed "The Nightingale" by Kristin Hannah. It was a great experience to revisit the characters and themes with other readers.
